Info.Title: Born of War
Info.Writer: Ben Hervey, Vicky Jewson (story), Rupert Whitaker (story)
Info.Actors: James Frain, Sofia Black-D'Elia, Lydia Leonard, Michael Maloney
Info.Plot: After her family is killed, Mina finds out her real father is a terrorist, and behind the killings. To get revenge, Mina works with British Intelligence to take him down.
